meta_title: CleanMyCSV - Clean your CSV files in seconds
meta_desc: CleanMyCSV harmonizes your CSV files in seconds. Fix inconsistent formats, duplicates, and errors. Fast, simple, and secure.
og_title: CleanMyCSV â€“ Clean your CSVs instantly
og_desc: A simple and fast tool to clean your CSV files. Save time guaranteed.
top_banner: In 2026, save time on what really matters.
hero_title: Clean CSV files. In an instant.
hero_subtext: No formulas. No errors. No wasted time.
hero_img_alt: Icons representing data sources to be cleaned
costs_title: Raw data hides more problems than you imagine.
costs_subtext:
A simple CSV file can contain dozens of small irregularities.
Individually, they seem harmless. Together, they waste your time and skew your results.
cost_1_desc: Different date formats, unstable separators, random capitalizationâ€¦ Your file loses its consistency.
cost_2_desc: Identical or similar rows mess up your totals without you noticing.
cost_3_desc: A shifted column or misaligned value is enough to break the table's logic.
costs_cta_text: CleanMyCSV spots these irregularities and puts your file back in order, automatically.
ben_1_desc: Dates, numbers, and separators finally follow the same rules.
ben_2_desc: Errors are adjusted without touching reliable data.
ben_3_desc: Your file regains a consistent structure in seconds.
ben_4_desc: Any CSV is accepted, regardless of its source.
ben_5_desc: Your files are deleted immediately after processing.
ben_6_desc: You clearly visualize every single adjustment.
doc_link_full: Learn more about CleanMyCSV: check our Documentation.
steps_main_title: Three steps. A simple routine, backed by advanced technology.
step_1_desc: Drag & drop your CSV. The transfer is secure.
step_2_desc: Stabilized formats, duplicates removed, errors fixed.
step_3_desc: A consistent CSV, accompanied by a report if needed.

cookie.title: Privacy Protection
cookie.description: We use cookies to measure audience and improve your experience on CleanMyCSV. This data helps us optimize our data processing tools.

post_download.security_delete: Your original data has been deleted from our servers for security.
